title: System Architecture
desc:
The system architecture is built on a **microservices-based** approach, ensuring high scalability and fault tolerance. Each component operates independently, communicating via lightweight protocols.

- **Frontend:** Built with Alpine.js and Tailwind CSS for a reactive, lightweight user experience.
- **Backend:** Powered by Node.js and Go for concurrent processing.
- **Database:** Utilizing MariaDB for structured data and Redis for high-speed caching.

This architecture allows for seamless updates and maintenance, ensuring that the system remains robust even under high load conditions.

title: Edge Computing
desc:
Our edge computing nodes are designed to process data closer to the source, significantly reducing latency and bandwidth usage.

Key features include:

- **Real-time Analytics:** Immediate processing of sensor data.
- **Offline Capability:** Continues operation even without internet connectivity.
- **Security:** Hardware-level encryption for data integrity.

These nodes serve as the backbone for our IoT implementation, bridging the physical and digital worlds.

title: Dashboard UI
desc:
The main control dashboard provides a comprehensive visualization of the entire network. Designers focused on usability and information density.

It features dynamic widgets that display:

- System Health Status
- Real-time Traffic Flows
- Active User Sessions
- Critical Alerts and Notifications

The interface is fully responsive, ensuring accessibility from desktop control centers to mobile field units.

title: Network Topology
desc:
A visualization of our mesh network topology, highlighting the redundant paths and self-healing capabilities of the grid.

Technical highlights:

- **Routing Protocol:** Custom variation of OLSR (Optimized Link State Routing).
- **Throughput:** Up to 1Gbps per node in optimal conditions.
- **Latency:** <10ms node-to-node hop time.

This robust network layer guarantees that critical data packets always find a route to their destination.

title: Hardware PCB
desc:
Custom multi-layer PCB design for our sensor modules, optimized for power efficiency and signal integrity.

Design specifications:

- 4-layer board stackup.
- Integrated power management IC (PMIC).
- Onboard ESP32 microcontroller.
- Compact form factor (30mm x 30mm).

The PCB layout minimizes electromagnetic interference (EMI) and ensures reliable operation in harsh industrial environments.

title: Mobile App
desc:
The companion mobile application allows users to monitor and control their devices on the go.

Core functionalities:

- **Biometric Login:** Secure access via FaceID or Fingerprint.
- **Push Notifications:** Instant alerts for critical events.
- **Remote Configuration:** Update device settings from anywhere.

Built with React Native to ensure a native look and feel on both iOS and Android platforms.
